meanings.definition: Pangens: a hypothetical unit of heredity that carries all possible genetic information
meanings.sent1: Scientists study how pangens carry genetic information.
meanings.sent2: The pangens from both parents combine to create unique offspring.
meanings.sent3: The pangens decided to throw a party to celebrate their genetic diversity.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of genetics, pangens bloom into a beautiful array of traits.
meanings.sent5: The pangens whispered secrets of inheritance to the next generation.

meanings.definition: Pangens: the smallest unit of heredity that can combine in various ways to produce offspring
meanings.sent1: Tiny pangens work together to create new life.
meanings.sent2: The pangens mix and match to form different traits in the offspring.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous pangens played a game of genetic roulette.
meanings.sent4: Like puzzle pieces, pangens fit together to form the genetic picture.
meanings.sent5: The pangens danced around, creating a symphony of genetic diversity.

meanings.definition: Pangens: the basic units of heredity that are passed down from parents to offspring
meanings.sent1: Parents pass on their pangens to their children.
meanings.sent2: The pangens inherited from ancestors shape the traits of the offspring.
meanings.sent3: The pangens traveled through generations, carrying the family legacy.
meanings.sent4: Like a genetic torch, pangens pass on the flame of heredity.
meanings.sent5: The pangens journeyed through time, weaving the tapestry of inheritance.
